content: I'm excited to try making my own pasta sauce from scratch. I've been meaning to experiment with different ingredients and techniques to get the flavor just right. By the way, I received a cocktail shaker and jigger online today, and I'm excited to try them out. I was thinking of making a classic Gin & Tonic to celebrate. Do you have any tips on how to get the perfect balance of flavors in a Gin & Tonic?
